page.title: 16EVENTS IN WATCHET
page.content: {WATCHET FLOWER SHOW}- is held every August to find the best quality of {flowers, vegetables}and{homemade things produced by people in the Watchet area. {WATCHET CARNIVAL}- is a dressing up parade of{1000 people}trying to win a prize as the best group or person in the Carnival.There were very old tractors and a band playing music, cadets marching aswell as lorries and floats.Everybody had nice clothes they had made.The 1st Watchet Brownies were {'Bees Around a Honey Pot'}and the best of all was Watchet Marine's{'Surgery'. {Polly Blackmore}was in the carnival she's in her nineties.They all paraded to the{Memorial Ground}where the prizes were given.If you wanted to you could go to the Fete afterwards. by P.Robinson,L.Powers,& C.Smith.
